POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
POLICY.CONTENT:
Privacy Policy

Payments. Online Payment Using a Bank Card

Our web site is connected to Internet acquiring. You can pay your Good using your Visa, MasterCard, Maestro and MIR bank card. After confirming a selected Good, a secure window will open, which provides a payment page of a CloudPayments processing centre, where you have to enter your bank card data.
